originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
title: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
content: A total of 1,000 Kenyans have reportedly been recruited to fight for Russia in its war against Ukraine.

originalTitle: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
title: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
content: Violence has plagued South Africa's highly competitive and lucrative taxi industry for decades.

originalTitle: Pakistan strikes Kabul, declares ‘open war’ on Afghanistan following clashe
title: Pakistan strikes Kabul, declares ‘open war’ on Afghanistan following clashe
content: Pakistan has struck Kabul and declared it’s in an ‘open war’ with Afghanistan. The fighting follows days of hostilities.

originalTitle: ‘No longer a threat’: How Canada U-turned on India ahead of Carney visit
title: ‘No longer a threat’: How Canada U-turned on India ahead of Carney visit
content: Canadian officials say India is no longer a 'security threat' after allegations of transnational violence rocked ties.

originalTitle: World reacts to eruption of fighting between Pakistan, Afghanistan
title: World reacts to eruption of fighting between Pakistan, Afghanistan
content: Countries around the world are urging the warring parties to show restraint.

originalTitle: Hillary Clinton tells House panel she 'had no idea' of Epstein's crimes
title: Hillary Clinton tells House panel she 'had no idea' of Epstein's crimes
content: The ex-secretary of state called for President Trump to be questioned under oath about his past association with the sex offender.

originalTitle: Netflix drops bid for Warner Bros, clearing way for Paramount takeover
title: Netflix drops bid for Warner Bros, clearing way for Paramount takeover
content: Netflix's decision to back down from the bidding war clears the path for Paramount to win the takeover battle.

originalTitle: 'Don't know what fuss was about' - chaotic Palace season could end in glory
title: 'Don't know what fuss was about' - chaotic Palace season could end in glory
content: Key players have gone, the manager is leaving and has criticised the club and upset fans - yet Crystal Palace's chaotic campaign could still end in European glory.

originalTitle: Sacking Amorim could cost Man Utd nearly £16m
title: Sacking Amorim could cost Man Utd nearly £16m
content: Ruben Amorim's 14 months in charge of Manchester United have come at a price, with the club now paying up to £15.9m to sack him, in addition to £11m to hire the Portuguese.

originalTitle: Out of Europe - now Celtic face critical fortnight
title: Out of Europe - now Celtic face critical fortnight
content: After exiting the Europa League, Celtic face a season-defining fortnight in the fight for the league and Scottish Cup.
